Key Match Events: Guerrero received a yellow card at 28'
Cartagena received a yellow card at 36'
Flores received a yellow card at 53'
Zambrano received a yellow card at 88'
Cueva received a yellow card at 90+4'
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina, the reigning world champions, aimed to maintain their perfect record in Group A
Peru needed maximum points to have any chance of escaping the group stage
Argentina secured their spot in the quarter-finals after beating Chile 1-0
Argentina had lost just two of their last 59 international matches since 2019
Peru had only accumulated one point from their opening two Group A fixtures
Peru needed to beat Argentina and hope for a draw between Canada and Chile to progress
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina topped a Copa America group for the first time since 2016
Peru was at risk of exiting the Copa America group stage for the first time since 1995
